Name: Firon
About the game: Firon is a high school student with no current ambitions for what he wants when he is older. Leads a normal life, with normal parents. He Likes to make snark remarks against people and doesn't take life too serious. Laid back. Isn't too passionate about much. The story follows him in his life which takes a turn in an unexpected direction when strange things start happening in his peaceful town. This is an adventure game with a story revolving around the main character, Firon. Features: - An adventure game that takes around 2-3 hours to complete. - A wide cast of characters. - Exploration based gameplay.
